instructions:
Make the bottom: brown butter then take off heat and add ice cube. mix 130g flour, 1/2 tsp salt, and brown sugar then add butter and spread on bottom of pan. bake at 350F for 10 minutes.

Make the caramel: dissolve sugar in water then boil on high until golden then remove from heat and mix in cream. spread on bottom layer.

Make the top: mix together eggs, 65g flour, turbinado sugar, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp baking powder, oats, coconut, and chocolate. put on top of caramel then bake at 350F for 20 minutes. cool and put in refrigerator. serve cold.
name: Dream Bar
